00053 @implementation CPOutlineView : CPTableView
00054 {
00055     id              _outlineViewDataSource;
00056     id              _outlineViewDelegate;
00057     CPTableColumn   _outlineTableColumn;

00074 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00075 {
00076     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00077 
00078     if (self)
00079     {
00080         // The root item has weight "0", thus represents the weight solely of its descendants.
00081         _rootItemInfo = { isExpanded:YES, isExpandable:NO, level:-1, row:-1, children:[], weight:0 };
00082 
00083         _itemsForRows = [];
00084         _itemInfosForItems = { };
00085         _disclosureControlsForRows = [];
00086 
00087         [self setIndentationPerLevel:16.0];
00088         [self setIndentationMarkerFollowsDataView:YES];
00089 
00090         [super setDataSource:[[_CPOutlineViewTableViewDataSource alloc] initWithOutlineView:self]];
00091 
00092         [self setDisclosureControlPrototype:[[CPDisclosureButton alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0.0, 0.0, 10.0, 10.0)]];
00093     }
00094 
00095     return self;
00096 }
00097 
00098 - (void)setDataSource:(id)aDataSource
00099 {
00100     if (_outlineViewDataSource === aDataSource)
00101         return;
00102 
00103     if (![aDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:child:ofItem:)])
00104         [CPException raise:CPInternalInconsistencyException reason:"Data source must implement 'outlineView:child:ofItem:'"];
00105 
00106     if (![aDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:isItemExpandable:)])
00107         [CPException raise:CPInternalInconsistencyException reason:"Data source must implement 'outlineView:isItemExpandable:'"];
00108 
00109     if (![aDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:numberOfChildrenOfItem:)])
00110         [CPException raise:CPInternalInconsistencyException reason:"Data source must implement 'outlineView:numberOfChildrenOfItem:'"];
00111 
00112     if (![aDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:objectValueForTableColumn:byItem:)])
00113         [CPException raise:CPInternalInconsistencyException reason:"Data source must implement 'outlineView:objectValueForTableColumn:byItem:'"];
00114 
00115     _outlineViewDataSource = aDataSource;
00116     _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods = 0;
00117 
00118     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:setObjectValue:forTableColumn:byItem:)])
00119         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_setObjectValue_forTableColumn_byItem_;
00120 
00121     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:shouldDeferDisplayingChildrenOfItem:)])
00122         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_shouldDeferDisplayingChildrenOfItem_;
00123 
00124     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:acceptDrop:item:childIndex:)])
00125         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_acceptDrop_item_childIndex_;
00126 
00127     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:validateDrop:proposedItem:proposedChildIndex:)])
00128         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_validateDrop_proposedItem_proposedChildIndex_;
00129 
00130     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:validateDrop:proposedRow:proposedDropOperation:)])
00131         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_validateDrop_proposedRow_proposedDropOperation_;
00132 
00133     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination:forDraggedItems:)])
00134         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination_forDraggedItems_;
00135 
00136     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:itemForPersistentObject:)])
00137         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_itemForPersistentObject_;
00138 
00139     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:persistentObjectForItem:)])
00140         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_persistentObjectForItem_;
00141 
00142     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:writeItems:toPasteboard:)])
00143         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_writeItems_toPasteboard_;
00144 
00145     if ([_outlineViewDataSource respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineView:sortDescriptorsDidChange:)])
00146         _implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods |= CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_sortDescriptorsDidChange_;
00147 
00148     [self reloadData];
00149 }
00150 
00151 - (id)dataSource
00152 {
00153     return _outlineViewDataSource;

00156 - (BOOL)isExpandable:(id)anItem
00157 {
00158     if (!anItem)
00159         return YES;
00160 
00161     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00162 
00163     if (!itemInfo)
00164         return NO;
00165 
00166     return itemInfo.isExpandable;
00167 }
00168 
00169 - (void)isItemExpanded:(id)anItem
00170 {
00171     if (!anItem)
00172         return YES;
00173 
00174     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00175 
00176     if (!itemInfo)
00177         return NO;
00178 
00179     return itemInfo.isExpanded;
00180 }
00181 
00182 - (void)expandItem:(id)anItem
00183 {
00184     if (!anItem)
00185         return;
00186 
00187     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00188 
00189     if (!itemInfo)
00190         return;
00191 
00192     if (itemInfo.isExpanded)
00193         return;
00194 
00195     itemInfo.isExpanded = YES;
00196 
00197     [self reloadItem:anItem reloadChildren:YES];
00198 }
00199 
00200 - (void)collapseItem:(id)anItem
00201 {
00202     if (!anItem)
00203         return;
00204 
00205     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00206 
00207     if (!itemInfo)
00208         return;
00209 
00210     if (!itemInfo.isExpanded)
00211         return;
00212 
00213     itemInfo.isExpanded = NO;
00214 
00215     [self reloadItem:anItem reloadChildren:YES];
00216 }
00217 
00218 - (void)reloadItem:(id)anItem
00219 {
00220     [self reloadItem:anItem reloadChildren:NO];
00221 }
00222 
00223 - (void)reloadItem:(id)anItem reloadChildren:(BOOL)shouldReloadChildren
00224 {
00225     if (!!shouldReloadChildren || !anItem)
00226         _loadItemInfoForItem(self, anItem);
00227     else
00228         _reloadItem(self, anItem);
00229 
00230     [super reloadData];
00231 }
00232 
00233 - (id)itemAtRow:(CPInteger)aRow
00234 {
00235     return _itemsForRows[aRow] || nil;
00236 }
00237 
00238 - (CPInteger)rowForItem:(id)anItem
00239 {
00240     if (!anItem)
00241         return _rootItemInfo.row;
00242 
00243     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00244 
00245     if (!itemInfo)
00246         return CPNotFound;
00247 
00248     return itemInfo.row;
00249 }

00252 {
00253     if (_outlineTableColumn === aTableColumn)
00254         return;
00255 
00256     _outlineTableColumn = aTableColumn;
00257 
00258     // FIXME: efficiency.
00259     [self reloadData];
00260 }

00263 {
00264     return _outlineTableColumn;

00267 - (CPInteger)levelForItem:(id)anItem
00268 {
00269     if (!anItem)
00270         return _rootItemInfo.level;
00271 
00272     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00273 
00274     if (!itemInfo)
00275         return CPNotFound;
00276 
00277     return itemInfo.level;
00278 }

00280 - (CPInteger)levelForRow:(CPInteger)aRow
00281 {
00282     return [self levelForItem:[self itemAtRow:aRow]];
00283 }

00285 - (void)setIndentationPerLevel:(float)anIndentationWidth
00286 {
00287     if (_indentationPerLevel === anIndentationWidth)
00288         return;
00289 
00290     _indentationPerLevel = anIndentationWidth;
00291 
00292     // FIXME: efficiency!!!!
00293     [self reloadData];
00294 }

00302 {

00317 - (id)parentForItem:(id)anItem
00318 {
00319     if (!anItem)
00320         return nil;
00321 
00322     var itemInfo = _itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]];
00323 
00324     if (!itemInfo)
00325         return nil;
00326 
00327     return itemInfo.parent;

00330 - (CGRect)frameOfOutlineDataViewAtColumn:(CPInteger)aColumn row:(CPInteger)aRow
00331 {
00332     var frame = [super frameOfDataViewAtColumn:aColumn row:aRow],
00333         indentationWidth = ([self levelForRow:aRow] + 1) * [self indentationPerLevel];
00334 
00335     frame.origin.x += indentationWidth;
00336     frame.size.width -= indentationWidth;
00337 
00338     return frame;
00339 }

00341 - (void)setDelegate:(id)aDelegate
00342 {
00343     if (_outlineViewDelegate === aDelegate)
00344         return;
00345 
00346     var defaultCenter = [CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter];
00347 
00348     if (_outlineViewDelegate)
00349     {
00350         if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewColumnDidMove:)])
00351             [defaultCenter
00352                 removeObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00353                           name:CPOutlineViewColumnDidMoveNotification
00354                         object:self];
00355 
00356         if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewColumnDidResize:)])
00357             [defaultCenter
00358                 removeObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00359                           name:CPOutlineViewColumnDidResizeNotification
00360                         object:self];
00361 
00362         if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionDidChange:)])
00363             [defaultCenter
00364                 removeObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00365                           name:CPOutlineViewSelectionDidChangeNotification
00366                         object:self];
00367 
00368         if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionIsChanging:)])
00369             [defaultCenter
00370                 removeObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00371                           name:CPOutlineViewSelectionIsChangingNotification
00372                         object:self];
00373     }
00374 
00375     _outlineViewDelegate = aDelegate;/*
00376     _implementedDelegateMethods = 0;
00377 
00378     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(selectionShouldChangeInTableView:)])
00379         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_selectionShouldChangeInTableView_;
00380 
00381     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:dataViewForTableColumn:row:)])
00382         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_dataViewForTableColumn_row_;
00383 
00384     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:didClickTableColumn:)])
00385         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_didClickTableColumn_;
00386

00388         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_didDragTableColumn_;

00391         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_heightOfRow_;
00392 
00393     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:isGroupRow:)])
00394         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_isGroupRow_;
00395 
00396     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:mouseDownInHeaderOfTableColumn:)])
00397         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_mouseDownInHeaderOfTableColumn_;
00398 
00399     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:nextTypeSelectMatchFromRow:toRow:forString:)])
00400         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_nextTypeSelectMatchFromRow_toRow_forString_;
00401 
00402     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:selectionIndexesForProposedSelection:)])
00403         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_selectionIndexesForProposedSelection_;
00404 
00405     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:shouldEditTableColumn:row:)])
00406         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldEditTableColumn_row_;
00407 
00408     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:shouldSelectRow:)])
00409         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldSelectRow_;
00410 
00411     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:shouldSelectTableColumn:)])
00412         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldSelectTableColumn_;
00413 
00414     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:shouldShowViewExpansionForTableColumn:row:)])
00415         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldShowViewExpansionForTableColumn_row_;
00416 
00417     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:shouldTrackView:forTableColumn:row:)])
00418         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldTrackView_forTableColumn_row_;

00421         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_shouldTypeSelectForEvent_withCurrentSearchString_;

00423     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(tableView:toolTipForView:rect:tableColumn:row:mouseLocation:)])
00424         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_toolTipForView_rect_tableColumn_row_mouseLocation_;

00430         _implementedDelegateMethods |= CPTableViewDelegate_tableView_willDisplayView_forTableColumn_row_;
00431 */
00432     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewColumnDidMove:)])
00433         [defaultCenter
00434             addObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00435             selector:@selector(outlineViewColumnDidMove:)
00436             name:CPOutlineViewColumnDidMoveNotification
00437             object:self];
00438

00440         [defaultCenter
00441             addObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00442             selector:@selector(outlineViewColumnDidMove:)
00443             name:CPOutlineViewColumnDidResizeNotification
00444             object:self];
00445 
00446     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionDidChange:)])
00447         [defaultCenter
00448             addObserver:_outlineViewDelegate
00449             selector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionDidChange:)
00450             name:CPOutlineViewSelectionDidChangeNotification
00451             object:self];
00452 
00453     if ([_outlineViewDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionIsChanging:)])
00454         [defaultCenter

00456             selector:@selector(outlineViewSelectionIsChanging:)
00457             name:CPOutlineViewSelectionIsChangingNotification

00466 - (void)setDisclosureControlPrototype:(CPControl)aControl
00467 {
00468     _disclosureControlPrototype = aControl;
00469     _disclosureControlData = nil;
00470     _disclosureControlQueue = [];
00471 
00472     // fIXME: reall?
00473     [self reloadData];
00474 }
00475 
00476 - (void)reloadData
00477 {
00478     [self reloadItem:nil reloadChildren:YES];
00479 }
00480 
00481 - (CGRect)frameOfDataViewAtColumn:(CPInteger)aColumn row:(CPInteger)aRow
00482 {
00483     var tableColumn = [self tableColumns][aColumn];
00484 
00485     if (tableColumn === _outlineTableColumn)
00486         return [self frameOfOutlineDataViewAtColumn:aColumn row:aRow];
00487 
00488     return [super frameOfDataViewAtColumn:aColumn row:aRow];
00489 }
00490 
00491 - (void)_loadDataViewsInRows:(CPIndexSet)rows columns:(CPIndexSet)columns
00492 {
00493     [super _loadDataViewsInRows:rows columns:columns];
00494 
00495     var outlineColumn = [[self tableColumns] indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:[self outlineTableColumn]];
00496 
00497     if (![columns containsIndex:outlineColumn])
00498         return;
00499 
00500     var rowArray = [];
00501 
00502     [rows getIndexes:rowArray maxCount:-1 inIndexRange:nil];
00503 
00504     var rowIndex = 0,
00505         rowsCount = rowArray.length;
00506 
00507     for (; rowIndex < rowsCount; ++rowIndex)
00508     {
00509         var row = rowArray[rowIndex],
00510             item = _itemsForRows[row],
00511             isExpandable = [self isExpandable:item];
00512 
00513        if (!isExpandable)
00514             continue;
00515 
00516         var control = [self _dequeueDisclosureControl],
00517             frame = [control frame],
00518             dataViewFrame = [self frameOfDataViewAtColumn:outlineColumn row:row];
00519 
00520         frame.origin.x = _indentationMarkerFollowsDataView ? _CGRectGetMinX(dataViewFrame) - _CGRectGetWidth(frame) : 0.0;
00521         frame.origin.y = _CGRectGetMinY(dataViewFrame);
00522         frame.size.height = _CGRectGetHeight(dataViewFrame);
00523         // FIXME: center instead?
00524         //frame.origin.y = _CGRectGetMidY(dataViewFrame) - _CGRectGetHeight(frame) / 2.0;
00525 
00526         _disclosureControlsForRows[row] = control;
00527 
00528         [control setState:[self isItemExpanded:item] ? CPOnState : CPOffState];
00529         [control setFrame:frame];
00530 
00531         [self addSubview:control];
00532     }
00533 }
00534 
00535 - (void)_unloadDataViewsInRows:(CPIndexSet)rows columns:(CPIndexSet)columns
00536 {
00537     [super _unloadDataViewsInRows:rows columns:columns];
00538 
00539     var outlineColumn = [[self tableColumns] indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:[self outlineTableColumn]];
00540 
00541     if (![columns containsIndex:outlineColumn])
00542         return;
00543 
00544     var rowArray = [];
00545 
00546     [rows getIndexes:rowArray maxCount:-1 inIndexRange:nil];
00547 
00548     var rowIndex = 0,
00549         rowsCount = rowArray.length;
00550 
00551     for (; rowIndex < rowsCount; ++rowIndex)
00552     {
00553         var row = rowArray[rowIndex],
00554             control = _disclosureControlsForRows[row];
00555 
00556         if (!control)
00557             continue;
00558 
00559         [control removeFromSuperview];
00560 
00561         [self _enqueueDisclosureControl:control];
00562 
00563         _disclosureControlsForRows[row] = nil;
00564     }
00565 }
00566 
00567 - (void)_toggleFromDisclosureControl:(CPControl)aControl
00568 {
00569     var controlFrame = [aControl frame],
00570         item = [self itemAtRow:[self rowAtPoint:_CGPointMake(_CGRectGetMinX(controlFrame), _CGRectGetMidY(controlFrame))]];
00571 
00572     if ([self isItemExpanded:item])
00573         [self collapseItem:item];
00574 
00575     else
00576         [self expandItem:item];
00577 }
00578 
00579 - (void)_enqueueDisclosureControl:(CPControl)aControl
00580 {
00581     _disclosureControlQueue.push(aControl);
00582 }
00583 
00584 - (CPControl)_dequeueDisclosureControl
00585 {
00586     if (_disclosureControlQueue.length)
00587         return _disclosureControlQueue.pop();
00588 
00589     if (!_disclosureControlData)
00590         if (!_disclosureControlPrototype)
00591             return nil;
00592         else
00593             _disclosureControlData = [CPKeyedArchiver archivedDataWithRootObject:_disclosureControlPrototype];
00594 
00595     var disclosureControl = [CPKeyedUnarchiver unarchiveObjectWithData:_disclosureControlData];
00596 
00597     [disclosureControl setTarget:self];
00598     [disclosureControl setAction:@selector(_toggleFromDisclosureControl:)];
00599 
00600     return disclosureControl;
00601 }
00602 
00603 - (void)_noteSelectionIsChanging
00604 {
00605     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter]
00606         postNotificationName:CPOutlineViewSelectionIsChangingNotification
00607                       object:self
00608                     userInfo:nil];
00609 }
00610 
00611 - (void)_noteSelectionDidChange
00612 {
00613     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter]
00614         postNotificationName:CPOutlineViewSelectionDidChangeNotification
00615                       object:self
00616                     userInfo:nil];
00617 }

00619 @end
00620 
00621 // FIX ME: We're using with() here because Safari fails if we use anOutlineView._itemInfosForItems or whatever... 
00622 var _reloadItem = function(/*CPOutlineView*/ anOutlineView, /*id*/ anItem)
00623 {
00624     if (!anItem)
00625         return;
00626     with(anOutlineView)
00627     {
00628         // Get the existing info if it exists.
00629         var itemInfosForItems = _itemInfosForItems,
00630             dataSource = _outlineViewDataSource,
00631             itemUID = [anItem UID],
00632             itemInfo = itemInfosForItems[itemUID];
00633         
00634         // If we're not in the tree, then just bail.
00635         if (!itemInfo)
00636             return [];
00637         
00638         // See if the item itself can be swapped out.
00639         var parent = itemInfo.parent,
00640             parentItemInfo = parent ? itemInfosForItems[[parent UID]] : _rootItemInfo,
00641             parentChildren = parentItemInfo.children,
00642             index = [parentChildren indexOfObjectIdenticalTo:anItem],
00643             newItem = [dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView child:index ofItem:parent];
00644         
00645         if (anItem !== newItem)
00646         {
00647             itemInfosForItems[[anItem UID]] = nil;
00648             itemInfosForItems[[newItem UID]] = itemInfo;
00649         
00650             parentChildren[index] = newItem;
00651             _itemsForRows[itemInfo.row] = newItem;
00652         }
00653         
00654         itemInfo.isExpandable = [dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView isItemExpandable:newItem];
00655         itemInfo.isExpanded = itemInfo.isExpandable && itemInfo.isExpanded;
00656     }
00657 }
00658 
00659 // FIX ME: We're using with() here because Safari fails if we use anOutlineView._itemInfosForItems or whatever... 
00660 var _loadItemInfoForItem = function(/*CPOutlineView*/ anOutlineView, /*id*/ anItem,  /*BOOL*/ isIntermediate)
00661 {
00662     with(anOutlineView)
00663     {
00664         var itemInfosForItems = _itemInfosForItems,
00665             dataSource = _outlineViewDataSource;
00666         
00667         if (!anItem)
00668             var itemInfo = _rootItemInfo;
00669         
00670         else
00671         {
00672             // Get the existing info if it exists.
00673             var itemUID = [anItem UID],
00674                 itemInfo = itemInfosForItems[itemUID];
00675         
00676             // If we're not in the tree, then just bail.
00677             if (!itemInfo)
00678                 return [];
00679         
00680             itemInfo.isExpandable = [dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView isItemExpandable:anItem];
00681         
00682             // If we were previously expanded, but now no longer expandable, "de-expand".
00683             // NOTE: we are *not* collapsing, thus no notification is posted.
00684             if (!itemInfo.isExpandable && itemInfo.isExpanded)
00685             {
00686                 itemInfo.isExpanded = NO;
00687                 itemInfo.children = [];
00688             }
00689         }
00690         
00691         // The root item does not count as a descendant.
00692         var weight = itemInfo.weight,
00693             descendants = anItem ? [anItem] : [];
00694         
00695         if (itemInfo.isExpanded && (!(_implementedOutlineViewDataSourceMethods & CPOutlineViewDataSource_outlineView_shouldDeferDisplayingChildrenOfItem_) ||
00696             ![dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView shouldDeferDisplayingChildrenOfItem:anItem]))
00697         {
00698             var index = 0,
00699                 count = [dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView numberOfChildrenOfItem:anItem],
00700                 level = itemInfo.level + 1;
00701         
00702             itemInfo.children = [];
00703         
00704             for (; index < count; ++index)
00705             {
00706                 var childItem = [dataSource outlineView:anOutlineView child:index ofItem:anItem],
00707                     childItemInfo = itemInfosForItems[[childItem UID]];
00708         
00709                 if (!childItemInfo)
00710                 {
00711                     childItemInfo = { isExpanded:NO, isExpandable:NO, children:[], weight:1 };
00712                     itemInfosForItems[[childItem UID]] = childItemInfo;
00713                 }
00714         
00715                 itemInfo.children[index] = childItem;
00716         
00717                 var childDescendants = _loadItemInfoForItem(anOutlineView, childItem, YES);
00718         
00719                 childItemInfo.parent = anItem;
00720                 childItemInfo.level = level;
00721                 descendants = descendants.concat(childDescendants);
00722             }
00723         }
00724         
00725         itemInfo.weight = descendants.length;
00726         
00727         if (!isIntermediate)
00728         {
00729             // row = -1 is the root item, so just go to row 0 since it is ignored.
00730             var index = MAX(itemInfo.row, 0),
00731                 itemsForRows = _itemsForRows;
00732         
00733             descendants.unshift(index, weight);
00734         
00735             itemsForRows.splice.apply(itemsForRows, descendants);
00736         
00737             var count = itemsForRows.length;
00738         
00739             for (; index < count; ++index)
00740                 itemInfosForItems[[itemsForRows[index] UID]].row = index;
00741         
00742             var deltaWeight = itemInfo.weight - weight;
00743         
00744             if (deltaWeight !== 0)
00745             {
00746                 var parent = itemInfo.parent;
00747         
00748                 while (parent)
00749                 {
00750                     var parentItemInfo = itemInfosForItems[[parent UID]];
00751         
00752                     parentItemInfo.weight += deltaWeight;
00753                     parent = parentItemInfo.parent;
00754                 }
00755         
00756                 if (anItem)
00757                     _rootItemInfo.weight += deltaWeight;
00758             }
00759         }
00760     }//end of with
00761     return descendants;
00762 }
00763 
00764 @implementation _CPOutlineViewTableViewDataSource : CPObject

00766     CPObject _outlineView;
00767 }
00768 
00769 - (id)initWithOutlineView:(CPOutlineView)anOutlineView
00770 {
00771     self = [super init];
00772 
00773     if (self)
00774         _outlineView = anOutlineView;
00775 
00776     return self;
00777 }
00778 
00779 - (CPInteger)numberOfRowsInTableView:(CPTableView)anOutlineView
00780 {
00781     return _outlineView._itemsForRows.length;
00782 }
00783 
00784 - (id)tableView:(CPTableView)aTableView objectValueForTableColumn:(CPTableColumn)aTableColumn row:(CPInteger)aRow
00785 {
00786     return [_outlineView._outlineViewDataSource outlineView:_outlineView objectValueForTableColumn:aTableColumn byItem:_outlineView._itemsForRows[aRow]];
00787 }

00808 @implementation CPDisclosureButton : CPButton
00809 {
00810     float _angle;
00811 }
00812 
00813 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00814 {
00815     self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame];
00816 
00817     if (self)
00818         [self setBordered:NO];
00819 
00820     return self;
00821 }
00822 
00823 - (void)setState:(CPState)aState
00824 {
00825     [super setState:aState];
00826 
00827     if ([self state] === CPOnState)
00828         _angle = 0.0;
00829 
00830     else
00831         _angle = -PI_2;
00832 }
00833 
00834 - (void)drawRect:(CGRect)aRect
00835 {
00836     var bounds = [self bounds],
00837         context = [[CPGraphicsContext currentContext] graphicsPort];
00838 
00839     CGContextBeginPath(context);
00840 
00841     CGContextTranslateCTM(context, _CGRectGetWidth(bounds) / 2.0, _CGRectGetHeight(bounds) / 2.0);
00842     CGContextRotateCTM(context, _angle);
00843     CGContextTranslateCTM(context, -_CGRectGetWidth(bounds) / 2.0, -_CGRectGetHeight(bounds) / 2.0);
00844 
00845     // Center, but crisp.
00846     CGContextTranslateCTM(context, FLOOR((_CGRectGetWidth(bounds) - 9.0) / 2.0), FLOOR((_CGRectGetHeight(bounds) - 8.0) / 2.0));
00847 
00848     CGContextMoveToPoint(context, 0.0, 0.0);
00849     CGContextAddLineToPoint(context, 9.0, 0.0);
00850     CGContextAddLineToPoint(context, 4.5, 8.0);
00851     CGContextAddLineToPoint(context, 0.0, 0.0);
00852 
00853     CGContextClosePath(context);
00854 
00855     CGContextSetFillColor(context, ([self themeState] & CPThemeState("highlighted")) ? [CPColor blackColor] : [CPColor grayColor]);
00856     CGContextFillPath(context);
00857 }
